title: (x) Harold's Photo center - Mistral, hand drawn {Chesh, Yves}
content: Does anyone know either of these fonts? Thanks for all the help! ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111075812im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22955.jpg)
author: julia

comments.content: The bottom looks like a knockoff of [Mistral](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111075812/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/mistral/d/testdrive.html?s=photo%2Bcenter&p=72). Don't know about the upper one.

I think the S is the most difficult and "alien" letter, what do you think it's the most difficult letter to do on a font? All my logos with an S were a nightmare. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111075812im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
